name: codemos-modern
description: Innovative, modern theme suite/hub for VS Code

codemosModern.auxiliaryThemeRegistries.markdownDescription: GitHub repositories that are auxiliary theme registries. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
codemosModern.auxiliaryThemeRegistries.patternErrorMessage: Please enter repositories in the valid format. Example: Codemos-Inc/Auxiliary-Theme-Registry

codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryUiTheme.markdownDescription: Auxiliary theme to be used as the UI theme for `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>/<publisher>/<extension>/<theme>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryUiTheme.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid auxiliary theme. Example: Codemos-Inc/Auxiliary-Theme-Registry/Microsoft/Defaults/Dark Modern

codemosModern.dark.design.markdownDescription: Design to be used in `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.

codemosModern.dark.accentColor.markdownDescription: HEX color code defining the accent color for `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Will be discarded if `codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set.
codemosModern.dark.accentColor.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid HEX color code. Example: #CB8569

codemosModern.dark.adaptiveMode.markdownDescription: Adaptive mode to be used in `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#adaptability) for reference.

codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryCodeTheme.markdownDescription: Auxiliary theme to be used as the code theme for `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>/<publisher>/<extension>/<theme>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryCodeTheme.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid auxiliary theme. Example: Codemos-Inc/Auxiliary-Theme-Registry/Microsoft/Defaults/Dark Modern

codemosModern.light.auxiliaryUiTheme.markdownDescription: Auxiliary theme to be used as the UI theme for `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>/<publisher>/<extension>/<theme>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
codemosModern.light.auxiliaryUiTheme.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid auxiliary theme. Example: Codemos-Inc/Auxiliary-Theme-Registry/Microsoft/Defaults/Light Modern

codemosModern.light.design.markdownDescription: Design to be used in `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.light.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.

codemosModern.light.accentColor.markdownDescription: HEX color code defining the accent color for `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.light.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set.
codemosModern.light.accentColor.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid HEX color code. Example: #784F3F

codemosModern.light.adaptiveMode.markdownDescription: Adaptive mode to be used in `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.light.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#adaptability) for reference.

codemosModern.light.auxiliaryCodeTheme.markdownDescription: Auxiliary theme to be used as the code theme for `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>/<publisher>/<extension>/<theme>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
codemosModern.light.auxiliaryCodeTheme.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid auxiliary theme. Example: Codemos-Inc/Auxiliary-Theme-Registry/Microsoft/Defaults/Light Modern

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run compile:theme && npm run compile:stateFile
scripts.clean: rm -rf out && rm -rf data/.state.json && rm -rf data/cache/*
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run lint
